<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mutagen](/Traits.aspx?ID=808)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>

Mutagens are a special type of [elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=589) that temporarily transmogrify the subject's body and mind. Typically, only [alchemists](/Classes.aspx?ID=56) have the expertise to craft mutagens. 

A mutagen always conveys one or more beneficial effects (listed in the Benefit entry) and one or more detrimental effects (shown in the Drawback entry). Mutagens are [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=670) effects, and a subsequent polymorph effect attempts to counteract an existing effect; the [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) check for a mutagen uses the item's level and a modifier equal to that [level's DC](/Rules.aspx?ID=2948) – 10.
